iati-activity.description: Chronic hepatitis B is a debilitating disease that affects >8% of Ghanaians. iati-activity.title: Legal Aid for Indigents in Ghana
iati-activity.description: Ghana's justice system does not guarantee free legal services for the poor and less-privileged persons who are unable to hire counsel to represent them. A State-funded legal aid scheme is woefully under-funded and ill-equipped to make any impact and there is no effective private alternative. Consequently, accused persons who cannot afford the services of counsel mostly end up in jail.
